text: Babies for Sale is a 1940 American crime drama movie directed by Charles Barton and starring Rochelle Hudson, Glenn Ford, Miles Mander, Isabel Jewell, Georgia Caine, Selmer Jackson, Edwin Stanley, Douglas Wood. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1940 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Barton
title: Babies for Sale
